content.raw:
We should review if this performance limits are valid or are too strict for not so fast machines.

BTW, we should start thinking on moving performance test to its own category and track them in a different way than unit and system tests. What should be consider a fail from a performance point of view it is relative.

We should review if this performance limits are valid or are too strict for not so fast machines.

BTW, we should start thinking on moving performance test to its own category and track them in a different way than unit and system tests. What should be consider a fail from a performance point of view it is relative.
